reviews.review: Shit never gets old.

Игра уже мягко говоря устарела как и её идея. Но она всё ещё держит меня лучше чем L4D2, она берёт не графоном а атмосферой (как то провёл в игре несколько часов просто читая описания карт и персонажей). Радует ещё то что разработчики не забывают её постоянно выпуская ДЛЦ обновления и много много фич типо тех что на новый год и хелуин. К недостаткам отнесу лишь нескончаемое кол-во ДЛЦ которые по стоимости обгоняют игру в 2-3 раза.

The game's pretty underrated, and it's a little better than you think.
Not all people will appreciate it, though,
This is the meatiest shooter going. Love it.

For a game that came out since 2009, I am surprised with the amazing effort from the community and Tripwire to keep this game alive and rollin'. By far Killing Floor is one of my favorite games of all time, the game itself is being frequently updated with new maps and weapons every holiday. The game goes on a 50-80% sale every time it got the chance to, so just try it out, best $20 dollars i've ever spent on a game.

I go through playing spurts with Killing Floor, but lately I've been bit by the Zed slaughtering bug once more.  Using teamwork and strategy to take out an ever-growing mob of freaky monsters is just so satisfying.  If one can find a good group to play with, one may glean hours of entertainment from this game.
Perhaps the best co-op horror survival game out there. Most definately worth every cent you spend on it.

Ууххх.... Класная командная игра всем советую =) !!!! Немного на LEFT 4 DEAD похожа. Есть также перки которые можно качать,которые дают не мало значимую выгоду и пользу !!Единственное что не понравилось то что бегать нельзя и сам персонаж чуть-чуть медлид, да и ботов в одиночном режиме нет.  А остальное КЛАСС 9/10 оценка.

Killing Floor zeigt einfach mal wie ein Guter Zombie Shooter geht es ist ein Mega gutes spiel und die waffen auswahl ist dank waffen DLCs gigantisch mann ist in einer gruppe freunde und kämpft sich durch 10 wellen voller Zombies nur am ende der welle 11 sich den Boss zu stellen. Durch Perks level machst du Extra schaden und beginnst das spiel mit einer Waffe es macht richtig viel Spaß auch wenn man nur Normal Spielt 10/10
Dis game iz gud.
For thoes Of you, that like to play as a team. I love the idea. So I give 10/10

Ce jeu est sans pitié et demande pas mal de sang froid pour s'en sortir. Mais le concept sans fioriture, et le feeling sensationnel de l'armement, font que l'on prend quand même du plaisir à se vautrer lamentablement, par exemple suite à une grosse bourde faite au mauvais moment. A essayer !

Yes. I recommend it. Its fun.  Blah blah blah... seriously... for less than $7 you get a game that is BY FAR more fun to play in my opinion than Left 4 Dead (1 and 2).  Personally, I've logged over 200 hours on this game.  More than L4D, L4D2, and even TF2 combined!  This is a great game.  With a great community for mods and support, you'd be dumb NOT to buy this game.

Killing Mutant clones, interesting weapons, and funny quotes makes for a wonderful co-op survival game.

If you like First Person Shooters, and you like odds that are always against you, then this is the game for you.  

Never had so much fun with a game that literally has no end objective, other than to survive the Patriarch.

A must have release. Seriously if steam was an OS this would be minesweeper. It is that essential. Tripwire did a terrific job with this one.The guns feel and sound great. They've got that sense of punch/kick and that weight to them that set this game appart from its peers. Also the levels are very well made and the whole atmosphere and rusty/decadent visuals create a demented playground of endless killings. If you like  FPS mp/co-op only titles or want a game that will provide you with an insane amount of hrs/$ then without a doubt grab this one.

Really fun game, probably its best when played with a mate, but overall cant beat trying to survive against waves of zombies! buying guns, ammo and working together! OO RAH!

Tripwire's masterpiece, there is a reason they won the "Make Something Unreal Contest" and got the lisence to make this game. This is a fine example of a class based survival game that can be player online or off.

I have never played a more challenging class-based shooter. 
This game WILL fuck you sideways ~ so be prepared to die often. It caters to all styles of gameplay, from support and healing to sniping and flamethrowers. It's got a little bit of something for everyone, and with >7 unique zombies that INTEND TO FUCK YOU SIDEWAYS with their various abilities, you're going to be playing for a while to level up.

A pretty standard Zombie survival game. There is on campain, its just you (and hopfully some friends) in a map with waves of zombies (not really zombies) coming at you. Moderate to high replayability. (I've stacked about 285 hours over about 3 years.)
If you like gunning down hordes of zombies, this game is for you. It is THE funnest FPS I've ever played in my life. Trust me it's just that good.....
Like killing zombies and monsters? Have fun.

Klling Floor is one of those games that you do not want to play with headphones in the dark at 4 AM. Coming from experience, it is NOT a fun way to spend your night and good luck sleeping later. While the game lacks the in-your-face feeling of the special infected of Left 4 Dead 2, the zombies in Killing Floor are endlessly more frieghtening and each one makes you fear for your life.

The in-game shop is also quite hilarious to use and see in the middle of a zombie battle, but it makes up for that in the amount of guns and weaponry you can use, far surpassing the amount of weapons in L4D2. The perks are all good and unique, and the fact that you can weld doors shut is extremely useful and can be the difference between life and death.

Highly recommend the game for any zombie game-lover, L4D2 lover, or horror genre lover. My only suggestion: Play with friends, and wear headphoens are your own peril.

I've recently been getting back into Killing Floor and been having a blast with it.  This game was among my first ever purchases on Steam, (in fact I think it is), and needless to say that this game has all things you can want from a zombie survival shooter.  The maps, the zombies (zeds or specimens), the weapons, and even the music makes you really feel immersed in the environment.  When they added their own objective gamemode, it really added a good creation of balance.  Not only that but Killing Floor is very Co-Op friendly in both internet latency and skill spanning gameplay.  In my honest and true opinion, I'd give Killing Floor a 10/10.
Kill zombies, acquire DOSH

Epic zombie fun ;D

Such a great arcade co-op experience. If you are looking for some casual, mindless FPS action or perhaps a more challenging and franctic session, KF's got it. The RPG style class and leveling system and their perks are just icing for this blood-filled beefcake that takes considerable time to grind.

If you're a fan of killing zombies, buy this game. That is, of course, if you don't mind the zombies wielding cannons on their arms and shooting flaming projectiles at you, or charging you with a chainsaw, or two drills for hands, then get this game! Get a couple of friends together and kick some zombie ass, you won't regret buying this game at all.

While certainly not something I could sit and play for hours at a time, this co-op survival FPS is still fun to come back to every now and then for a quick round. Simple, easy to pick up, and straightforward gameplay makes this one of the simpler pleasures in my library.

Zombies and such are all too overused these days, but there's something to be said for frantically trying to keep a horde of the things at bay with some mates. Left 4 Dead is obviously the more famous attempt, but Killing Floor is every bit as worthy of your time. Some people seem to think everything Valve touches turns to gold, but that doesn't mean you can't prefer one zombie shooter over theirs.

Killing Floor is coop survival done right. There are different weapons that are more potent for the corresponding perk. If playing strategically this game will be a perfect way to understand how spawn blocking works.

Totally ripped Gladius off for his Best use of a farm animal award
From an unreal tournament 2004 mod to a fully fleshed out game. It just feels great to massacre Zombies and get stronger with more levels.

Meilleur que L4D à mon goût (bien que la comparaison ne se tienne qu'au fait que ce soit des jeux de zombis)... comparatif : plus sombre, amélioration du personnage, spécialisation du personnage, teamplay mis en avant, difficulté accrue. Néanmoins, graphismes moins jolis, IA beaucoup moins précise (c'est un jeu de vrais zombis, pas de zombis surdoués). Question de goûts.

Many will pass this up as another zombie-hoard shooter, but there's real charm in this. Fast paced action, good guns, and goofy British voices.

В этой игре я провёл много часов и не жалею! Сначала играл п.и.р.а.т.к.у, но потом купил в стиме. Правда играть реже стал тут почему то. Но игра однозначно стоит внимания! Очень хардкорная и весёлая игрушка!  Для меня это одна из самых запоминающихся игр:)

This game has everything it takes to make a fun game. It has zombie heads being cut off, huge zombies exploding, zombies on fire, machineguns, shotguns, rocket launchers, chainsaws, sniper rifle and a boss on each map. Also, you can level up perks, although it does not take too long to reach maximum level - so you can play the hardest games.
And when I say hardest I mean really hard. It takes co-op play, a lot of reflexes and training, positioning strategy, precision shooting, well-spending money and a lot of planning. This is really different from those easy games we find nowadays. It's totally worth it.
I don't know what's going on.

Fun game. People keep comparing it to Left 4 Dead 1 and 2, which they shouldn't. They both different types of FPS. L4D 1+2 is getting from point A to point B (with other modes, etc) Killing Floor is about about surviving the waves of enemies, which you can win. Unlike L4D 1+2's survival mode which you cannot win. Killing Floor is a uncomplex game if looking at such on the surface; It's a shooter about surviving a post apocolyptic onslaught of waves of mutated and zombified enemies in a map that can often kick you in the ass if you aren't paying attention to it.

However, further down past the rotting skin and flesh of the obvious, lies a much more compelling gameplay and cooperative mode that many shooters lack in the modern gaming community. 

In Killing Floor, you are often matched against very powerful enemies that takes more than two hands and a automatic grenade launcher to lie them out. This game takes tactic and skill along with friends who won't act as though you are an AI to be beaten with ignorance and the cold shoulder. 

This game has a unlimited amount of maps allowing for gameplay that is never the same, requiring new tactics and skill every map. 

Overall, Killing Floor is well worth the perchase if you are a FPS fanatic and strategy genius.
Awesome multiplayer!!!!!  =D

Уебищное кривое говно, собранное на коленке двумя студентами-индусами, не додумавшимся прикрутить к старому КФ-моду ничего, кроме ГРАФОНА, да ещё и мыльному. Нормально анимировать хоть что-то, кроме оружия вообще забыли. Однако, прикруть "ОТДАЙ 2.99$ ЗА НОВЫЙ ПАК СКИНОВ" они не забыли, да.Ставка идет на ололо хоркор-риалисм, который резко улетучивается даже на HoE, когда заместо рандомных хуев на паблике играет хоть сколько-то слаженная команда. Ну, и еще PRESS Q FOR RESTORE HEALTH с GUYS, I NEED SOME MONEY. Гoвноеды просто.
